node.html:
End to End Face-Recognition follows the approach described in [1] with modifications inspired by the OpenFace project.

Keras is used for implementing the CNN, Dlib and OpenCV for aligning faces on input images.

Semi-hard triplet loss and online semi-hard triplet generator are used for further fine-tuning.

Face recognition performance is evaluated on a small subset of the LFW dataset which you can replace with your own custom dataset

e.g. with images of your family and friends if you want to further experiment with the notebook.

â€¢ Got 97% F1 score & 99.5% accuracy after fine-tuning on LFW sub dataset.

Augmented Reality Sudoku solver, finds Sudoku puzzles in the photo/video and then displays the solution in the original image/video maintaining orientation.

Can detect multiple Sudoku puzzles, invariant to image lighting and rotation.

Uses a custom digit recognition CNN pipeline with preprocessing and Image augmentation.
Implemented Denoising Autoencoder on MNIST and CIFAR10 datasets. Used batch-normalization, dropout, and custom callbacks. Compared the result of using transposed convolution from Upsampling.
